captions.text:
It's raining
ZIA x Lee Hyun
When it rains, I still
think about you, how about you?
I think about the time
we waited for the morning together, how about you?
With things we shouldn't have said
We hurt each other
like we won't be hurt
After saying goodbye like so
Time has passed, how are you now?

Drop, drop, drop
How are you, do you still hate me?
When it rains with words that couldn't reach you

Again and again, I think about you
About the past
I live like this, how about you?
It's raining outside, it brings you to me
Are you listening to the rain now?
It's raining outside, it brings you to me
Are you thinking about me too?
With things we shouldn't have said
We broke each other's hearts
that used to burn for each other
After saying goodbye like so
Time has passed, how are you now?

Drop, drop, drop
How are you, do you still hate me?
When it rains with words that couldn't reach you

Again and again, I think about you
About the past
I live like this, how about you?
It's raining outside, it brings you to me
Are you listening to the rain now?
It's raining outside, it brings you to me
Are you thinking about me too?
It's raining outside, it brings you to me
Are you listening to the rain now?
It's raining outside, it brings you to me
Are you thinking about me too?

It's raining
ZIA x Lee Hyun
